name: Circle Jump (DirectCherry)
description:
A simple game inspired by retro arcade game cabinets.

Goal: Continuously jump your way up the scrolling platforms. If you survive for 60 seconds, you have won!

Made for One Minute Game jams #1 with the theme Wired. The theme reminded me of old arcade cabinets with their components and wiring all within the machine. I tried to embrace the arcade-genre and emulate the aesthetic of the cabinet screens in the graphics for this game.
